content.detailedDescription:
My elder sister and i awoke in the night (ages 4 and 8) to find almond shaped, red eyes in every window of the house.  other occupants of the house could not be awakened but were cold and hard as though dead.  
my sister and i ran from room to room and found the eyes in every window including some that were 10 feet off the ground.
we could not awaken our siblings nor our parents.
content.summary: Ufo was not witnessed

content.detailedDescription:
I am seeing strange, crazy and unreal objects in the sky. i have been for the past month. last night was by far the scariest one yet. it was very very close, silent, and hovering. i was shaking, to be honest i thought about running in the house. it was so weird, it just hovered over the house behind me. it was so still and quiet, almost like it was watching me. my digital camera died while watching. i was shaking so bad that the video isn't very good, and it looks like a plane, but i can promise you that it was not a plane. i tried to zoom in, but it was so close that i couldn't. i was so in shock that i was watching it instead of shooting the video. but you can hear me clicking zooming in and out but yet you can not hear a thing from this object. the reason why i started recording this was there were so many objects, i believe were helicopters coming from every direction. this object was too close for comfort and it was not a plane. something strange is happening in the dallas sky at night and just want to know what it is.
i have so many pictures and videos; i swear i am not crazy or delusional, something strange is happening, not sure if it is military or drones... but i have always been fascinated by meteorology and astronomy; and this is by far the most interesting, addicting and frightening sky i have ever seen.
content.summary: Very close object hovering

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I have had two ufo sightings around 2005 or so
the first location was st lukes hospital huddersfield 
iwas in the courtyard i heard loud jet sound i looked up to see a white cylinder without wings fly directly above me heading in a northerly direction.I thought i might have not seen the wings that it was a business jet but later a black helicopter with a double digit number on the front hovered low to the ground outside the window of the hospital which made me suspect it was something unusual.
the second sighting was a bit later on and the children were outside my house playing my daughter shouted look a ufo i heard a noise of a loud jet an said they dont make noises ilooked up high in the sky i saw a silver object probably cylindrical making circling   above a neighbours roof line. at that moment a silver 737 came low over our house it had red stripe over windows which is unusual at it never ever has happens here because it was so low almost rooftop level i thought.The ufo later went behind the roof line and could not be seen later.﻿
content.summary: Two cylinder encounter (separate)

content.detailedDescription:
The above incedent took place and both my brother and i turned at same time to see what seemed to be a race of lights in the sky.  after 15 or 20 min: they the glowing lights that made a low noise took off faster then any plane or spaceship can fly. the speed was unbeleiveable and disappared. 
to this day i remember everything but my brother who is 1 year older than i does not remember a thing.  frustrating for me, but he has no memory of this day.  why why ? i know it happened.....
on the night of this sighting sky was very clear and very calm no wind. we were returning from hanging out with friends, and made it home by curfue. we were walking to our home from the driveway and both turn aroud at same time. we never said a word to each other while this race of lights was happening. just heard a low comforting sound of speed this went on for about 15 to 20 min: from the west to northwest in split second. white to greenish white glowing lights 6 to 10 of them.
after several west to northwest then back to the west trips by these lights all of them became 1 and took off from a hover in a high speed unexplainable, never to be seen again.


these lights would go so so fast then come to a stop so fast it would cause very sever injurys if done by humans. 

my brother and i discussed this action that night and in fact i remember telling our parents about it that night.  my brother to this day does not remember anything of that night ??? and my parents are no longer with us.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One night in late june 1966 observered several glowing lights fling at very high rate of speed as if having a race from the west to northwest at speeds faster then any plane can fly,

content.detailedDescription: Happened to go outside, and look up.  it just appeared, then started to descend, with a sharp descant then gradually went to level flight.  there was no sound, like you would hear with the descent of a jet or helicopter. the object appeared to be triangular in shape with 3 white lights that appeared to grow, possibly from the descent  of the unknown craft.  the entire episode lasted approximately 12 to 14 min. i had thought about getting my cellphone to take a picture, but found myself to mesmerized. that is about all i remember of the event.
content.summary: Sharp descent then appeared to level out.

content.detailedDescription: In aug 1967 i had left home in rainier,or heading back to my next army base at ft. benning,ga. my wife (ex)patt was with me. as we were traveling in the new mexico desert at about 4am we had just drove down off a hill and was on the valley floor when i noticed 2 orbs in my rear view mirror coming off the mtn.They appeared to be about the size of a softball,one a little larger than the other,pulsating.I first thought they were motor cycle headlights.Within seconds they were larger than basketballs and right on my bumper. i was in awe about their speed and told patt to look behind us to see if she could figure out what they were. at about the same time one on them went to the right side of the car and traveled alongside our car about 20 feet away at the same speed. i then thought maybe it was a train or something like that.There was no noise at all.As the one was traveling alongside the other one moved from the rear of the car up the trunk and  onto the top of our car a few feet above the roof and the car then had a luminescence inside, a yellowish color.I then started to smell an odor like burning coated wire. then the generator light came on and the engine shut off. by now patt was getting real scared as we sat there confused as to what was going on. i decided to get out of the car as patt was yelling at me to stay in the car. i got out and stood up looking at the object a few feet over my head. they were no longer pulsating and making no noise.I don't know how long i stood and do not remember getting back into the car. the next thing i do remember is sitting in the driver seat and looking out the widow to my right and seeing the two objects hovering above the valley floor stationary. they both then took off in a swaying pattern and within seconds were ascending high into the mtn range and were gone. i sat there dazed for a few minutes and started the engine. it did start but the battery was low and the generator had burned out giving out no power. it was still dark out but there was enough light to drive with the headlights out so i did that saving power to run the car. we travel a few miles into gallop nm. during the whole incident we never saw another car on the highway. other than that night i don't remember ever talking about it, it was like it never happen.There was about an hour of time we can not account for,i often wondered if something else took place that night.I hope this story makes sense to you.Thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 orbs twice size of basketball

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend joey where returning from a skatepark. as we drove down netherland inn rd. i noticed a light 150 away at an elevation of about 400 ft to the northwest of us. as i continued to observe the light, i noticed 2 more lights suddenly. one more to the west then the third almost on top of us forming a triangle that seemed to me to be approximately 150 yards across. it took a minute to realize this was one large object instead of three separate  objects as my view was obscured by me being in a car. we pulled off at the observation area established by the city of kingsport to view netherland inn park as well as rotherwood mansion. we exited the car and began to observe the triangle. the object came slowly from the west running parrallel to houlston army ammunition plant. we watched it(triangle) for about 3 minutes as it came to a stop 30 yards away at an elevation if about 350ft. it was absolutely huge. an irrational fear, at least it seemed to be at the time gripped me. i told joey lets get in the car and leave. the last thing i clearly recall is moving toward joeys car. i saw bright light from behind me begin to light the entire area. the very next memory i have is of joey and myself sitting in front of my apartment building, located about a mile from the netherland inn observation area. neither of us had any memory whatsoever of driving that last mile to my apartment. since our encounter with this object, my friend joey had told me on several occasions that he thought something major had occurred that night . i have recurring dreams of the encounter in which joey and i are being escorted through an unusual craft and feeling as if our escorts are not malicious yet not human either. joey has since committed suicide and i myself have had several strange events occur that i have no explanation for. the latest being last night at 3:30 a.M. july 21, 2015
content.summary: We observed the triangle at 11pm. it began to descend. bright light appeared from the triangle. sudden overwhelming feeling of occupants. lose of time

content.detailedDescription: In a natural phenomenon caused by sunlight an object is positioned in the sky
content.summary: Object in a sunlight phenomenon

content.detailedDescription: Me and 4 others were up hunting after lunch byson basin. was no clouds we got to an dead end trail and was coming back when we seen this whit looking think hovering in the sky we all seen it but couldn't explain what it was watched it for about 30 seconds it took off in a horizontal direction up till u couldn't see it any more at speeds never seen before. no cloud streem no noise. so drove on about 2 min. looked up and there it was again hovering above us. about 30 seconds then took off again same manor. we looked at each other said what the heck i said if that thing comes back i will freak out. drove little why about 3 mins. stoped to look for deer. then there it was again seem like same height. got my phone and took pictures as it was leaving. when u blow up the pictures on the phone is motipule lights. then the 3rd time it left shot up in sky where could see it and seconds later something high up  streaked across the sky it wasn't military i grew up around that at speeds iv never seen and would appear and disappear across sky and was informed that friend that was with me seen the same object not to long ago in maxson basin.
content.summary: Have pictures came back 3 times up in high mountains and had speeds that were unexplainable and movments.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were camping out at lake calamus in nebraska. high winds at 3am caused us to vacate our tent and move to our truck. after a restless few moments we got situated. my wife was asleep. i set starring out the windshield of the truck for several minutes uneasy about the wind. a small light appeared in the distance, my eyes followed i assumed it was a small plane, i watch it disappear behind some nearby tree and then reappear on a completely different level somewhat lower, it then moved in the opposite direction in a flash and then shot up in elevation, i watched it perform this maneuver a couple of times it then dropped down in front of my truck 40 to 50 feet away and hovered about 4 or 5 seconds about 8-10 feet in the air, just as i was reaching for my wife to wake her up it shot directly toward my windshield and flew over the truck clearing the cab by less than a foot and disappearing behind me.
the complete episode was perhaps less than 3 minutes, it left me very unsettled in an already uneasy night time storm
content.summary: Watched what i thought was an airplane, it started to do erraditc movements

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the beach here in mar del plata, argentina with a bunch of my friends at night. some of them took their fishing poles with them. we were having a round of mate (argentine tea). i was not facing the sea. all of a sudden a hear all the people there besides my friends screaming like crazy. they shouted look a ufo! a ufo! i turned around and i see this blue (weird blue object) hovering over the surface approximately 200 hundred meters from the rocky shore. i was just amazed and couldnt believe what was happening. people were like crazy, shouting like maniacs. then this round object starts gaining altitude and in a matter of seconds flew over us and it dissapeared before our eyes in what i can describe as a kind of implosion sound. 
it left a vapor like trace behind. 
as funny as it may sound remember how the de lorean from the back to the future movie dissapeared? it was pretty much like it. 
when i first noticed it i had no doubt that was a ufo. why? because it was clearly a manned artefact. someone was like, behind the wheel, thats what we all felt. the thing was the size of a small two door car. 
first i was astonished, and when it started moving and it did that crazy manuever over us i was terrified. i was sorry and at the same time relieved that it had left. 
i dont know what else to say. i didnt believe in stories about ufos before the incident, maybe thats why i was so astonished at the time it happened. 
we also felt a weird emotion. its like wow, we actually saw maybe extraterrestrials dude! after it left we wanted to see more and wished it would show up again, its like when you ride a roller coaster you wish it would stop when its going but when the rush is over you want to experience that rush again.
nothing man-made can do what that artefact did. the fastest things we have constructed would desintegrate into pieces if they did what this object did. it was just too fast. i know no living thing can survive an acceleration and turn like that. 
and what about the fact that it vanished before our eyes? thats the craziest thing about this incident. it didnt lose itself on the distance, no, it literaly vanished. 
first thing some people will say is dude, that was a shooting star. 
are you kidding me? it came out of the water. it floated over the water, it accelerated changing direction. 
sometimes you got to see this things in person to believe them. 
anyway, my bro managed to fotograph it. we got the original for everyone to check it out. 
you can also interview my friends. 
some of them were already fishing therefore facing the sea and were amongt the firsts to see it. 

note: there was quite a quantity of people there beside us. it was what we call "a long weekend", that is a weekend plus holydays, hundreds of thousands of tourists visit our city on such holydays so you do the math how many people beside us saw this ufo. 
what i'm trying to say is, no, we werent all high and allucinating. 
we dont do drugs. we do "mate".
check out the picture, though it really doesnt make the sight justice by itself.     
you got to see it live baby!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared hovering just over the water, hovered for like 15 seconds, and it suddenly shot into space at amazing speed, made a weird roar like noise and dissapeared before our eyes leaving a vapor like stelle behind it.

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from a paranormal investigation..Driving northbound on us 23.......And all the sudden,this light appeared out of nowhere....It was quite a distance.....6 orbs came out of that light.....They were hovering..... then they regrouped into that light..Then faded away

I was sitting in the backseat of my roommates suv as she was driving north just after we picked up her boyfriend from the airport. as we were driving north on south semoran blvd in winter park florida, my roommate that we just picked up spotted a triangular craft hovering just below the tree line as we were all astonished by what we were looking at. i can still remember to this day that the craft was dark in color, made no noise, had a bright red light in the center, and what appeared to be windows around the edges of the craft. the craft looked huge in size from what i could describe as between 100 and 300 foot in size while we able to witness this craft for aprox 20 seconds before the tree line hid the craft from sight because we were moving. as i told my roommate to do a u-turn so i could photograph this craft, she did and to my astonishment, the craft was gone within the 30 seconds or so from doing a u-turn. i can only assume that the craft took off at a high rate of speed that i did not witness, or it became invisible.
content.summary: Triangular craft with a bright flashing red light in the center

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)

content.summary: Better picture of the craft

content.detailedDescription: I was in a parking lot going to load a backhoe on the trailer when looking at the sky, which i do frequently wasn't sure but thought it was a balloon descending. by the way it was moving said to myself that's no balloon. so i grab my phone and started to document it's travel taking numerous photos of it. it acted as if it were a blimp in the way it was maneuvering, but it made no noise, had no propellers, didn't move to fast,but was consistent in its speed.It almost landed then it took back to going up and over toward me at that point it went basically straight back up into the sky till i couldn't see it anymore.If it was just a drone,it was high tech.I was kind of amazed at it was so quite and what  propelled  it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Acted like a blimp in the way it moved,no propellers no noise it made

content.detailedDescription: Britecloud like object changes shape in a fixed orbit,dark circle in middle sometimes,can be seen at sunset in the western sky,

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the camp fire facing west when the spacecraft lifted up just abouve the trees  aprox, a half a mile away it was sauser shaped very very large  larger than cosco or a wal mart store.It sat there aprox. 60 to 90 sec.   then started geting brighter and brighter untile the whole area was litup brighter than daylite this took  aprox. 20 to 30 sec. then the spacecraft shot stright up and was gone we thought it was so hi we view of it untile started getting brighter again shot to the eastern horison made a 3 positon triangler move and shot into space.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lifted off slow and stoped above treetops  craft started geting briterr and briter shot strate up stoped got brite again andshot to the eastern horison  got brite  and shot into spaceer

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were about to go to bed at around 11-12 pm on a saturday night, when i was asked to get something from our vehicle in the driveway.  as i was going to our truck, i noticed a v formation of 5 lights flying out of the sw above fairy lake moving silently toward the ne across the lake and over my house.  once they passed, i noticed another formation coming from the same direction again, but with more lights in the formation.  i ran in the house and asked my wife to come out and see, to make sure i wasn't the only one witnessing this.  the both of us then watched that v pattern fly over and then a 3rd one as well.  during the 3rd flyover, the lights split into different groups with some heading north and another group heading to the east, the remainder keeping the same course as the previous objects.

these objects made absolutely no sound, but i'm not sure of their altitude.
content.summary: Multiple formations of white dots. 5 to 7 objects each formation flying in v formation, then splitting off.  made no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was working swing shift. it was approximately 8:15 pm. i frequently  observe the sky at night in awe of the stars, planets and moon. i noticed the orb-like light traveling east bound smoothly through the sky absent of any sound. it seemed to be very close. i watched it for about 30 seconds when it stopped it's east-bound path and darted straight up, still absent of sound, until it was no longer visible. the incident gave me goosebumps. moments later my brother in law came out of the store with his family and i eager  asked him "where the hell were you two minutes ago man? i just saw a ufo!" i do believe there are visitors from other planets realms galaxies etc.. once my mother and i seen something similar around 20 years ago. never reported it though. thank you!
content.summary: Walking outside. saw orb like object headed east. no sound. orb stopped and darted straight up until out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Three of us saw red orbs coming from the laughlin nv side of the colorado river flying in a straight path to the bullhead city az side.They were in triangle  formation and some were just a single orb.They disappeared into a cloud on the az side.Event lasted about 15 min.Very strange.Orbs were about 1 -2 min apart .
content.summary: Three of us saw  many flying red orbs .Some in traingle formation others just a single orb .All going in a straight path  coming from the laughlin nv side  of the river to the az side and dissapeared into a cloud .Event lasted aboy 15 min.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i stood up from the couch getting ready to go to bed and looked out my window.

2. i saw red and white lights flashing erratically outside.

3. i was unsure what it was. it looked like fireworks or the flashing lights on a police car. i thought my neighbor who had recently left my house may have been down there doing something. i called his home phone and when he answered i told him to look across the field to see if he could see anything. he said he didn't see anything so i told him to come over and to bring his rifle. i then walked outside with my pistol. as i walked outside i noticed my dog hunkered in the corner of my carport with his tail tucked between his legs which was unusual, as he was a pit bull and normally barked all night. i fired a couple of warning shots into the air to scare off the intruder, but the lights continued to flash until my neighbor drove past them in his pickup. they began to flash again when he pulled into my yard and exited the vehicle.

4. at first the lights looked like they were the size of a beach ball and farther away, but after i walked out into my yard closer to them i could tell they were about the size of a baseball and about twenty or thirty feet away from me. they were flashing red and white, but mostly white. the light looked sort of like the flash of a camera, only it didn't reflect off the objects around it. sometimes it flashed for a few seconds at a time, and some times it flashed only for a split second. sometimes it flashed while it was sitting still suspended in midair, and other times it flashed while it was moving. most of the time the object floated around slowly within three to six feet of the ground, give or take a couple of feet. other times it would move incredibly quickly and higher into the air, especially when being fired upon. the object could stop abruptly in mid-flight and sit perfectly still. it made absolutely no noise and appeared to be only a light (i couldn't see it if it wasn't flashing). the light might be described as sharp, hard and metallic.

5. i was frightened at the sight of something i couldn't explain or understand. after my neighbor arrived i began to fire shots at it. i fired eight to ten shots at the object while my neighbor watched in wonder. it moved so fast that i would still be firing in one direction, and it would be fifteen or twenty feet in another direction. when i realized i couldn't shoot it i became even more frightened and suggested to my neighbor that we go inside. i would rather have ran away, but to do that i would've had to have driven right past the object, as my drive way was the only way out and the object was in my front yard. i turned around and started walking toward my house with my neighbor following behind looking over his shoulder. as i was walking the whole front of my house lit up all of a sudden and only for a split second. i stopped and turned around as my neighbor caught up with me. he said that the object had flashed very brightly and that the flash looked different. together, we went inside my house, along with my dog who i normally did't allow in the house, and continued to watch the object through the window. we watched it float around the field by my house for two or three hours until i fell asleep, gun in hand. my neighbor stayed at my house that night and stayed up watching it for another couple of hours.

6. my neighbor said the object was still hovering around out in the field by my house when he finally fell asleep. when we went out in the daylight the next day the object was gone and left no noticeable trace of its presence.
content.summary: White and red flashing light moving around in yard and field for hours

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i were packing up from a weekend camping trip. in nearby trees i noticed a flashing white light. (i had been feeling somewhat queasy all morning) this light landed and i began to make out an oval/spherical craft carrying 3 ghostly white passengers and arranging to pick up 2 more. they were all somewhat uniform as far as their actions and appearance. i watched closely as the two outsiders dissipated before my fiancee and i's eyes, as if the craft vaporized the beings (possible entry method..?) and as soon as they were out of sight the craft shot straight up out of sight. i walked over to inspect the area and there were no marks left on the ground but i could feel ever so powerfully an aura of energy rradiaing from the entire area (about 25'x20') once my fiancee and i were on our way back, our radio began cutting in and out.*** i believe i heard them speak.*** their dialect was somewhat 'minion' like (yes, you read that right. gru's minions. yes, from dispicable me) and i heard one of them clearly pronunciate "hello" and as they greeted me in my own language, i noticed the same white pulsating light closing in in my rear view mirror. no radio stations were coming in. i had to switch my truck to the reserve fuel tank (i had just filled the #1 tank as well but for some reason it was failing) and i gained it away from what seemed to be an enticing visit..As cars passed going the opposite direction they were stopped dead in their tracks, some swerved off the road and caused damage to the vehicle and passengers.. then the light turns blood red. pulsating at about an average human heart rate (60-70bpm), my terror intensified. i am now going 100+ on country roads and it's definitely not getting further, it's right up on us. from underneath i see a bright blue white light as my fiancee says "this is it" i slam to a stop, jump out with my rifle and dire an instant warning shot as soon as i get clear of my car door (i'm inside shooting out the window) and jump out. my truck turns off on its own, the craft and occupants are gone. we made it home safe but have seen those same lights again and again. sometimes out back, sometimes right over the house. i have seen these things and they do not i repeat they do not want to be friends!!! i have come out to my truck tore open but no alarm sounding. catalytic converters. i don't know maybe the gold they use in them but the things keep taking my converter!!! for an f250 that's 1,000+ bucks an encounter! they'd be worth more hanging on my wall! i see them running around on occasion, during family gatherings and barbeques out back, it's like they're taunting me to make the first violent move, then i couldn't imagine what they're capable of. i sleep 2 hours a night since these things have been around. i can almost guarantee there is one on my property as i type. i have since rented a more residential home for my fiancee and the encounters have become more and more scarce but my property in napoleon is a hotspot for these things. i only have one message for them: i am extremely interested in your culture and species, i just don't want to become a specimen of your research. please stop harassing my family and we can see that things come to a peaceful understanding..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object chased my car for miles. causing other vehicles to swerve off road. chased me after i witnessed its occupants board the landing craft in a nearby forest...Have had further more terrifying and direct experiences this is just the first, they know i k

content.detailedDescription:
We are climbing up the hill (in a car) to the astoria column, while my wife was driving, i witness this flying saucer.  it hovered for a while (it is out away from me probably 700 ft or so??? then took off towards the east horizontally in a quick move for about a 1/4 mile or so  (i am up a hill out looking over the "youngs river bay" just off the columbia river)it stopped again for a couple seconds ( i am now looking out at saddle mountain) or so and then it shot up in about a 80 degree pitch at super hyper speed. my wife still remembers today me telling her what i witnessed that day.  i am just wondering if anyone else reported the event.  i don't know exactly the date, but remember the sun shinning down on this thing which doesn't happen that many days of the year on the oregon coast.

i guess i was excited, ....... it kind of left myself feeling amazed of what i witness knowing this was really happening to me.  i was puzzle that wife didn't say much when i told her; i was expecting her to ask me a 100 questions.  she just said, ok.  she didn't say i was seeing things and she didn't take much interest.

thanks in advance if you can come up with any other report!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Climbing up the hill (in a car) to the astoria column while my wife was driving and witness this flying saucer

content.detailedDescription:
I looked up into the sky and took notice of a star sitting in the sky next to a brighter one. 

this did not look natural. a very powerful and bright light was visible from start to finish when after a minute or two of staying put in the western reaches of the sky as though hung from a ceiling. the uninterrupted brightness of the object told me it was no star and the fact that the closer it came as though it were on a cable stretched across the sky, it couldn't have been a drone based on its stability, acceleration, overall speed and stealth in which it travelled east across the sky above where i was standing to the north. 

the object also emitted no audible noise.

as the mysterious shape travelled in a straight line to the east, it made its path further south than east and sped up until it was gone in an instant. 


two other lights showed up later on around 10:46pm and would change paths and move around in the western sky. 

only one light appears in the western sky now and will spend some time each night in one spot and then travel northwest to the town of mossbank. this is when it appears around 9:45pm-10:20pm. it has been sighted later also but that's too late for me lol. 

object will fade into a yellow glow when it travels northeast.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright stationary light takes off with speed

content.detailedDescription: My 13 yr old daughter and i were returning home by suv north, up taulbut road hill. we were just past the lacrosse box and almost at 14th when we both saw a bright electric white, with blue-silver tint, rectangular-ish mass appear about 45 degrees above the horizon (in front window) and descend quickly, straight down, below the horizon in about 3 seconds. it had a short fuzzy trail (not like a fireball) on the upward side and looked kind of like an electric sparkler all over the surface (like the em drives on the ships in the matrix movies). we waited for an explosion but there wasn't any sound, impact or smoke. the skies were clear blue but it was twilight and the sun was going down. it was hard to tell the size or how far away, but i'd guess it was the size of a small house. it looked like it landed somewhere north of where we were. i drove all the streets and checked all the parks north of mission in the area i though it would have landed (between cedar and stave lake road, and best and ?), and in that time the sun went down. there are lots of homes in that area. it could have landed beyond the farthest street, where there are lakes and woods, but i was also running out of gas and my daughter was a little creeped out, like we were in a horror movie, so we went and got gas and went home.
content.summary: My daughter and i were driving up taulbut near 14th when we clearly saw a rectangle of electricity descend below the horizon.

content.summary: About a mile and a half above ground. followed by a white object that passed by at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My encounter happened when i was 9 years old.My family was on vacation from ca.To my grandmas house in thurston,nebraska(near pender).It was the last night of our stay.There was  a big dance at the grange hall,and i went there with my family. at about 10:30,three of the local boys and i decided we were going home,as the dance had gotten pretty boring for us. as we started off on the couple of blocks walk toward home,one of the other boys suggested we go the long way across the field and by the reservoir.That sounded like fun,so i followed them out of town and across the field.
after what seemed like a fairly short walk, we came upon what looked to me to be a large curved building with windows floor to ceiling.The light coming out of it was like nothing i had ever seen-it was very white and even though it was very bright,it didn't hurt my eyes. the windows were all there was-no real outer walls-it was all windows. the windows were about 5ft.Wide x 10ft.Tall,or 6 ft. x 12 ft. i'm not sure exactly, but that was the proportion of them. the "building" was shaped like two disks with windows separating them.
at this point the three boys i was with hid behind a rock,or log or something and told me to get down.I crouched  down and asked them what that was, and one said " i don't know,it was never there before-that's were the reservoir is".Well,i thought, these guys must just be trying to scare me,because in my opinion it would take months to build that structure.
i knew there was no way it was built without them knowing about the project,so i thought they must be trying to prank the kid from ca. 
so i stood up-refusing to fall for their "trick". 
this is when i noticed all of the activity that was going on.That is also when "they" noticed us.Then i noticed that i could not move at all.My friends slowly stood up,with kind of blank looks on their faces.By now i could see "them".My first thought was that these were marionettes, because a man could not fit into those "costumes".Their joints were very small compared to the rest of their body, much like a lizard or insect.
then just as quickly i realized that these were real....Dudes, things, or whatever you want to call them.
there were two distinctly different types that i saw.Most of them were what everybody refers to as the "greys".They were shorter than me and seamed to be wearing some kind of jumpsuit that was the same color as their skin, pretty much.They had the big head and almond shaped eyes like has been described by many people.I got the impression that these were females.
all i know for sure is that they were totally submissive to the taller ones.The tall ones were much different than the grays-i got the impression that these were males. at any rate,they were in charge and not friendly. these were the ones that had the very small leg joints,so i knew it was not a guy in a suit.They also had an elephant trunk type head-it was like they had a pony tail, but it was skin-part of their head.It was the size of their head then tapered down to the tip, which was blunt at the end, like the fat end of an egg.This "ponytail" reached down to mid back, and was segmented like a cartoon inchworm.(remember i was only 9 years old) it seemed to be stationary-that is,they didn't seem to be able to move it, and it moved with their head without flopping around. these beings were taller than me,and seemed to be wearing a sort of robe that was  dark in color-black or dark gray. their actual facial features looked very much like "et the extra-terrestrial".(seriously) i only saw two or three of these guys-they seemed to confer with each other and go separate ways.At this point i could clearly see,but i don't know if i was moving my eyeballs,or just seeing what was right in front of me.I was looking at the tall one standing in front of me and i was thinking to myself "weird!!! look at that dudes head!" at this point he turned toward me-it was clear he had "heard" what i was thinking.He somehow gave me a message without using words-but it was crystal clear in my head.The message was that our worth to them was no more than the worth of cows to a rancher.Their interest in our personal lives is zero.I was told of the futility of our entire existence,and that of the universe as well.The impression i received was that the entire existence of everything has already happened-its beginning and its end-it all happened in an instant and it does not continue.Somehow we are experiencing it in some kind of slow motion.(or the jerk just wanted to scare the heck out of me, and was lying,i don't know).
after this one of the greys "spoke" to me in the same non-verbal way, but this time with words in my head that i "heard"(but it did not come in through my ears).It said "just do what he says and everything will be o.K." i remember being comforted by that.
next my friends walked up a ramp into what i now knew was not a building. i don't remember anything else until we were walking up to my grandmas house. at that point i didn't remember anything that had happened-i thought we took about a 20 minuet detour through the field and came home.
when i walked into my grandmas house,i was confused by the presence of many people,and all of them were at the dance just 20 minuets ago....And my dad was no longer wearing his party clothes-he had changed into his everyday clothing.They were all excited that i was home,and asked were i had been.I told them we had taken a "shortcut" through the field.This seemed to satisfy them, but i had no idea how it was all of a sudden 1:30 in the morning...All i remembered was we left the dance at 10:30, took a 20 minuet walk home and when we got there, everyone thought we had been missing.I didn't really know what was going on, and i was hustled off to bed.I was extreamly tired and fell right to sleep.
the next morning,we packed up the car and headed back to ca.
that's when the recurring nightmares started.
in one i am walking past my house,and a skull is sitting in the flower bed.As i walk by it,it somehow starts tickling me and i cant get away,it is holding me frozen in place somehow.It says to me-"who am i?"
and i answer-"i don't know" again-"who am i?" again-"i don't know"
once more-"who am i?" this time i answer "you're nobody"-and it releases me.That's the end of that dream.
the next recurring dream is of me being held captive at the bottom of the reservoir that was behind our house.The "people" holding me wore black robes with pointed hoods and we were under water,but able to breath. there is no talking or sound in that dream that i can remember. 
i had these dreams several times each,then never had them again.
the morning after the encounter,i didn't remember any of it,but i could definitely sense that there was something in my memory that was not there before.I didn't know what it was-very vague,almost forgotten in the distant past is how it seemed.It was a while before i realized that something weird had happened.The more i remembered,the weirder it seemed. and i knew if someone told me this story,i would think something terrible had happened to him for his mind to make up that wild fantasy.Even at 9 years old,i new it would be best to keep it to myself.
but the more i think about it,the more i think it should be told,so there it is.
content.summary: 1972 encounter-9 years old. encountered a landed craft with two types of beings

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Sighted while driving with wife and kids....Stopped and took photos...Im an aircraft mechanic so i recognise normal aircraft shapes and features...These are uncommon...Zoom in...It changes shape
content.summary: One trail broke into two following an aircraft uncharacteristic of a common shape of any common aircraft...Shot straight up fast

content.detailedDescription: It was just after 11 pm & i took the dog downstairs to go use the bathroom but i also had to relieve myself so i went beside the fence. as i was about to turn around i saw to my left,a "shooting star" that was a little larger than normal dart straight behind some trees that are directly across the street but i thought maybe it was a bug or bat flying around the streetlight so i ducked a little to get a little more of the streetlight out of my eyes..Well looked for maybe 10 seconds just to be sure and as i was about to turn away,it shot out from behind the trees at the same speed and right before it got out of site it looked as if it started to ascend. but all i know as it reminded me of these "dreams" i was having off and on for a few months(abt 20 years ago) i always felt different since then and years later while watching tv and reading books it reminded me of this "mad itch" i had all over my body because i never experienced something so irretating..My grandfather who was a pastor got some people to pray over it to go away. thats how bad it had gotten. what i saw in my "dream" was kinda rectangle but it was the size of a city..I've always called it a "steele city"..And in all of my dreams i was a child living where i grew up..It may mean nothing but it truly affected me and it takes alot to even begin to affect me. thank you so much for your time in reading this and all the time you give to the study.  sincerely yours, john anthony mercer      i'm sorry but there's one more detail i left out..I'm just not sure what it meant if anything..Some time ago(12,13years maybe) i had to go to er for pain in head & neck and they done 5 spinal taps in 4 days but could not get fluid and they say something in the brain scan that they could not identify..I'm assuming it's still there but no more pain..It probably doesn't mean anything but..Thank you
content.summary: Looked like shooting star that stopped and took back off

content.detailedDescription:
Its about mid may. my wife and i were watching tv and our picture window faces due south . its about 9:15 to 9:30 pm. kids were in bed. when we both seen it at the same time. a tear drop shaped object was going from east to west on about a 30 to 35 degree angle. it was a light blue green in color. what was weird there were no debree comeing off of it. but their was a distortion waves like you see on hot pavement. the next day it was in the paper. people in sun valley and surrounding towns too. only it was now going south to north.  the year was around 1990. check with the times news paper in twin falls, idaho. i belive a mufon investigator was reported too in the paper.

other evidence is the news paper or papers
content.summary: Wife and i seen tear drop shape,light blue green going east to west. next people up north seen it too only it was going  south to north. had heat wave behind .
